rukus.text: Ate inakara karana vali'am ne akhi'a, ki jadom asim ate sade pi'um-dade vi miti ho javange â€œtam ki asim dharati vicom (bahara) kadhe javange
Isa da va'ada sade nala vi kita gi'a ate isa tom pahilam sade pi'u-dadi'am nala vi. Iha sirafa pichale (hom cuki'am) di'am kahani'am hana
Akho, ki dharati te turo phiro, phira vekho ki papi'am da ki hala ho'i'a
Ate unham la'i dukha na karo ate na hi dila chota karo, unham di'am calam nala jihari'am uha kara rahe hana
Ate uha akhade hana, ki iha va'ada kadom hai. (Daso) jekara tusim sace ho
Akho, ki jisa ciza di tusim kahali kara rahe ho sa'ida usa vicom kujha tuhade nere a lagi'a hove
Ate besaka tuhada raba lokam ute bari kirapa karana vala hai, para unham vicom zi'adatara sukara ada nahim karade
Ate besaka tuhada raba cagi taram janada hai. Jihara unham de dilam vica luki'a ho'i'a hai ate jisa nu uha pragata karade hana
Ate akasam te dharati di ko'i luki ho'i ciza nahim, jihari isa sapasata kitaba vica daraja na hove
Besaka iha kura'ana isara'ila di aulada ute bahuta sari'am cizam nu sapasata kara riha hai. Jinham la'i uha matabheda karade hana
Ate uha hada'ita te rahimata hai, imana vali'am la'i
Besaka tuhada raba apane hukama de rahim unham vicakara phaisala karega, uha sakatisali ate janana vala hai
Isa la'i alaha te bharosa karo, besaka tusim' pratakha tora te saca'i de raha te ho
Tusim muradi'am nu nahim suna sakade ate na tusim boli'am nu apani gala suna sakade ho, jadom ki uha muha phera ke cale jana

Ate na tusim anhi'am nu gumarahi de puthe raha tom baca ke (caga) raha dikha'una vale ho. Tusim sirafa unham nu suna sakade ho jihare sadi'am a'itam te imana li'a'unde hana ate phira agi'akari ho jande hana
Ate jadom unham te iha gala a pavegi tam asim unham la'i dharati tom ika janavara (karura jiva) kadhange, jihatam unham nala gala karega, ki loka sadi'am a'itam ute visavasa nahim rakhade si
